  • Editor

Diagrams

This is of the diagrams API.

Paths

GET Diagrams

Returns all of the diagrams.

Parameters
  • limit (false)
  • page (false)
  • search (false)
  • tags (false)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
    • Content
      • application/json - Diagrams

POST Diagram

Adds a diagram.

Request Body:
  • Diagram
Responses:
  • 201 - 201 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
    • Content
      • application/json - Diagram

OPTIONS

Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Methods (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Headers (string)

GET Diagram

Return and individual diagrams.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
    • Content
      • application/json - Diagram

PUT Diagram

Updates a diagram.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Request Body:
  • Diagram
Responses:
  • 204 - 204 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)

DELETE Diagram

Deltes a diagram.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Responses:
  • 204 - 204 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)

OPTIONS

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Methods (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Headers (string)

GET Diagram Tags

Returns all of the tags for a diagram.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
    • Content
      • application/json - Tags

POST Diagram Tag

Adds a tag for a diagram.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Request Body:
  • Diagram
Responses:
  • 201 - 201 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)

OPTIONS

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Methods (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Headers (string)

DELETE Diagram Tag

Deletes a diagram tag.

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
  • tag_id (true)
Responses:
  • 204 - 204 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)

OPTIONS

Parameters
  • diagram_id (true)
  • tag_id (true)
Responses:
  • 200 - 200 response
    • Headers
      • Access-Control-Allow-Origin (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Methods (string)
      • Access-Control-Allow-Headers (string)
    • Content
      • application/json - Diagram

Response Bodies

Required: true

Content:

  • Diagram (application/json)

Schema

Type: array

Items:

  • Diagram

Type: object

Properties:

  • name (string)
  • description (string)

Required:

  • name

Type: object

Properties:

  • name (string)
  • version (string)
  • description (string)
  • url (string)

Required:

  • name

Type: array

Items:

  • Tag
Footer
